You've learned how to create traps that cause greater injuries. You deal an additional 1d6 precision damage with damaging [snares](/Traits.aspx?ID=146) you craft. This increases to 2d6 additional precision damage if you're legendary in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4).
